name: Ryūjin
shortLoreBlurb: Dragon king of the ocean with a palace under the waves; controls tides with magical jewels.
overlapsLinks: Jörmungandr (Norse), Leviathan (Hebrew), Naga (India/SE Asia), Poseidon (Greek), Quetzalcoatl (Aztec), Tangaroa (Polynesia), Yemaya (Yoruba)
description: Dragon king of the ocean with a palace under the waves; controls tides with magical jewels.
